H0.text: What was the name of the short-lived republic that existed in south-eastern Nigeria between 1967 and 1970. Igbo Republic

H1.text: What was the name of the short-lived republic that existed in south-eastern Nigeria between 1967 and 1970. Niger Delta Republic

H2.text: What was the name of the short-lived republic that existed in south-eastern Nigeria between 1967 and 1970. Eastern Nigeria Republic

H3.text: What was the name of the short-lived republic that existed in south-eastern Nigeria between 1967 and 1970. Biafra

A4.text: Biafra ( bee-AF-r…ô;), officially the Republic of Biafra

A5.text: Biafra was a partially recognised state in West Africa that declared independence from Nigeria and existed from 1967 to 1970
